{
    "maxLineLength": 80
}
---
var foo,bar,baz;

let someReallyLongVariableName, anotherReallyLongVariableName, somethingElseReallyLong;

// functions

const yy = function () {
bar();
};

const x = function () {
    // hello
    bar();
},y=5;

const a = 5,
b = function() {
    bar();
},
c = 5;

// object literals

var person = {
name:"Nicholas"
}

let task = {
                    id: 1
}, num=2;

let count=  3,
 task2 = {
// test
                    id: 1,
                    completed: false
};

// array literals

let items = [
"foo"
];

let items2 = [
"foo"
], item2Count=1;

let items3Count=2,
items3 = [
    // hi
"foo", "bar"
];
---
var foo, bar, baz;

let someReallyLongVariableName,
    anotherReallyLongVariableName,
    somethingElseReallyLong;

// functions

const yy = function() {
    bar();
};

const x = function() {
        // hello
        bar();
    },
    y = 5;

const a = 5,
    b = function() {
        bar();
    },
    c = 5;

// object literals

var person = {
    name: "Nicholas"
};

let task = {
        id: 1
    },
    num = 2;

let count = 3,
    task2 = {
        // test
        id: 1,
        completed: false
    };

// array literals

let items = [
    "foo"
];

let items2 = [
        "foo"
    ],
    item2Count = 1;

let items3Count = 2,
    items3 = [
        // hi
        "foo",
        "bar"
    ];
